transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haanji sir aap bataiye, woh buyleads ka aap bata rahe the na mujhe. To abhi aapne check kari buyleads?
Customer: Nahi nahi, abhi aayi nahi hai isliye to maine aapko call kiya, call back kiya. Nahi abhi do din se aayi nahi hai bilkul bhi.
Executive: Subah cylinder ki to ab aa gayi na, shayad 6 minute pehle aayi hai.
Customer: Oh, 10 liter mein woh nahi, subah nahi, PCVR gun cylinder woh set ki nahi hai, yeh mere use kaam ki nahi hai abhi.
Executive: PCVR wale ka ek bar mujhe naam WhatsApp karke bhejiye, main isko na dusre wale usme check karti hu. Achha aapne dusre number se call kiya abhi aapka number se?
Customer: Nahi nahi, maine to mere hi number se call kara sir, woh TI ID pe ja rahi hogi.
Executive: Recorded line. Okay hai na? Achha to main aapko WhatsApp pe naam bhej deta hu, aap bata dijiye mere ko.
Executive: Haan phone call reh ke ek bar WhatsApp pe naam bhejiye, main usko check karke abhi aapko bata deti hu.
Customer: Haan, thik hai thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states buyleads not received for two days.

- States the received cylinder buylead is not useful.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to share the name on WhatsApp.

- Executive will check and inform the customer.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, whatsapp, cylinder
